chandima wirakkodi (1)
“del wanjanenan honda..
wimal wirawansha mahatha deshapalana hethumatha bandhanagaragathawa sitiyadi ohuta erehiwa me pirisa thiraya pitupasa yam yam de kala bawada kiyawini.
harsha ekka mama keattawatath ethanin charidu, nirosh denna ekka mawanallatath, mawanallen lahiru, sachith ha anith dennath samaga "bathalegala"ta.
mama inen adala gaththa sudusukan layisthuwa.
ohuge gayana hakiyawa gana katha kaloth(mama me katha karanne yu tiyub eke thibba abhiman chithrapataye sinduwa ahala pamanayi.
miyusik karana, film karana, loku aartist la pawa podi job ekak set wenakal inne amarikawata hari wena kohe hari pana ganna.
monawada me kata katha?
eeke rangapawe wimal kumara da kostha.
kella pus patiyek wage puru puru ganna gannawaya."
2014 subhama subha awuruddak wenna kiyala prarthana karanawa.
